query:
SELECT
                model.id,
                model.brand_id,
                model.name,
                model.description,

                brand.name AS brand_name,
                brand.description AS brand_description
            FROM
            "Model" as model
                INNER JOIN
            "Brand" as brand ON (model.brand_id = brand.id)
            WHERE
                (model.name = $1 OR $1 IS NULL)
                AND (brand.id = $2 OR $2 IS NULL)
